name: sweep
actor_no_arg: You look at your empty arms and sigh.
others_no_arg: $n looks at $s empty arms and sighs.
actor_found_target: You sweep $M into your arms and kiss $M long and deeply.
others_found: $n sweeps $N into $s arms and kisses $M long and deeply.
target_found: $n sweeps you into $s arms and kisses you long and deeply.
actor_auto: The object of your kiss is absent.
